Description:
1. Randomly remove 1 copy of Olga Safronova, Patricia Simms, and Sarah Pierce from the game. Set each other card aside, out of play. Do not look at their reverse sides.
2. Shuffle and arrange the 6 Nussbaum Academy Interior locations so that they form a ring around the Performance Hall. Each Academy location is connected to each location next to it (clockwise or counterclockwise from it) in addition to its connection symbols.
Name: Notecard
